--- Menasor / Astroblast / Switchblade / Rippersnapper ---

Menasor yells in anger, when two missiles ram into his face, 
destroying one of his optics, he stands up and turns around to attack 
Prowl again, when another two missiles streak by him, and several 
charges smash into his head and shoulders. Menasor, a little 
disoriented, swings a large round house punch at Prowl.

--------------------------------

Astroblast pulls up, missiles grazing his bottom. He catches one 
missile with his tractor beam, and turns it around sending it back at 
the jet he can see behind him.

Switchblade's cloaking energy is depleted, he decloaks, and 
laughs. "Astroblast open your hatch a bit, I'm going to toss some 
demo packs at the tailers."

Astroblast's hatch opens up enough or Switchblade to toss something 
out.

Switchblade pulls out two antimatter demo charges. "Food for thought 
stupid jet." He mutters to himself, as he sets the charges to 
detonate when they reach the jet that he can see behind. He throws 
one at the jets behind, waits a second, then throws the other in the 
same matter. The explosion should deter any further followers.

--------------------------------

Rippersnapper growls and grows even more angrier at the 
word, "retreat". "Rippersnapper no want retreat, Rippersnapper want 
destroy Maximal!" lasers from Orion sear his optics, rendering him 
blinded for a second, the Rippersnapper reluctantly transforms, 
following Astroblast. He fires two blasts from his cyclone gun back 
at Orion as he goes.
